name: Palam Tea
shortDescription: Palam Tea, a premium blend that captures the serene beauty and rich heritage of the Himalayan region in every cup.Taste the pure, healthy tea from northwest India's tea capital Palampur. Palampur is famous for its lush tea gardens surrounded by the Dhauladhar range, connecting you to the beauty of the Himalayas.
fullDescription: Pricing Options => . 50g Pack: ₹150 . 100g Pack: ₹280 . 250g Pack: ₹650 . 500g Pack: ₹1,200

name: Himalayan Apricots
shortDescription: Enjoy the delightful sweet and tangy flavor of Himalayan Apricots, carefully selected from the serene orchards of the himalayas.These apricots are not just tasty but also rich in essential nutrients, offering a perfect snack option for any time of the day. Order now from Him Farms Organic Agrotech and taste the purity of the Himalayas in every bite!
fullDescription: Pricing Options => . 250g Pack: ₹300 . 500g Pack: ₹550 . 1kg Pack: ₹1000.  Heart Health: Their dietary fiber helps lower bad cholesterol, promoting a healthy heart. Eye Health: High in Vitamin A, apricots enhance vision and support eye health. Skin Nourishment: Apricots' vitamins and minerals nourish the skin, promoting a radiant appearance. Digestive Support: Their high fiber content aids digestion and prevents constipation. Bone Strength: Apricots, rich in calcium and potassium, support strong and healthy bones.

name: California Walnuts Kernels Premium, Raw
shortDescription: Experience the premium quality of our California Walnut Kernels – a 200g pack of raw goodness. These walnuts are carefully selected for their superior quality and taste. Packed with nutrients and healthy fats, they make a versatile addition to your diet. Enjoy their natural flavor and numerous health benefits in your culinary creations or as a wholesome snack.
fullDescription: California Walnut Kernels Premium – 200g, Raw offer a host of benefits => Nutrient-Rich: Packed with essential nutrients, including omega-3 fatty acids, vitamins, and minerals, promoting overall well-being. Heart Health: Walnuts are known to support cardiovascular health by reducing cholesterol levels and improving blood vessel function. Brain Health: Omega-3 fatty acids in walnuts are beneficial for cognitive function and may reduce the risk of age-related cognitive decline. Antioxidant Properties: Rich in antioxidants, they combat free radicals, reducing oxidative stress in the body. Weight Management: Protein, fiber, and healthy fats promote a feeling of fullness, aiding in weight management. Versatile Ingredient: Use them in a variety of dishes, from salads to baked goods, enhancing both taste and nutrition. Incorporate these premium California Walnut Kernels into your diet to enjoy these benefits and savor their delicious and nutritious goodness.

name: Organic Curry Leaves
shortDescription: Discover the authentic flavor and health benefits of our Organic Curry Leaves/Karuveppillai Dried Leaf Granules. This 200g pack contains the essence of pure curry leaves, known for their aromatic taste and numerous health advantages. Elevate your culinary creations and embrace the goodness of nature with every sprinkle of these dried leaf granules.
fullDescription: Organic Curry Leaves/Karuveppillai Dried Leaf Granules offer a range of benefits => Enhanced Flavor: Infuse your dishes with the rich and aromatic taste of curry leaves, elevating the flavor profile of your meals. Digestive Aid: Curry leaves can aid in digestion and help alleviate common digestive issues, promoting a healthy gut. Antioxidant Rich: Packed with antioxidants, they assist in neutralizing harmful free radicals in the body. Hair and Skin Health: Curry leaves are known to improve the health of your hair and skin, promoting natural shine and radiance. Weight Management: They may contribute to weight management by assisting in the breakdown of fats. Blood Sugar Control: Some studies suggest that curry leaves may help regulate blood sugar levels. Rich in Nutrients: Curry leaves are a source of essential vitamins and minerals, including iron, calcium, and vitamin C. Elevate your culinary creations and enjoy the health benefits of Organic Curry Leaves/Karuveppillai Dried Leaf Granules in your daily cooking.

name: King Oyster Mushroom
shortDescription: Experience the rich and robust flavor of our King Oyster Mushrooms in a convenient 200g pack. These mushrooms are known for their distinct shape and meaty texture, making them a versatile addition to various culinary creations. Elevate your dishes with the savory goodness of King Oyster Mushrooms, perfect for enhancing the flavor of your favorite recipes.
fullDescription: King Oyster Mushrooms – 200g offer several health benefits => Low in Calories: They are a low-calorie option, making them suitable for those managing their calorie intake. Rich in Nutrients: King Oyster mushrooms provide essential vitamins and minerals, including B-vitamins, potassium, and iron. Dietary Fiber: They contain dietary fiber, which promotes healthy digestion and supports a feeling of fullness. Savory Flavor: Their robust and meaty texture adds a savory umami flavor to dishes. Versatile Ingredient: Ideal for a wide range of recipes, from stir-fries to soups and grilling. Vegetarian Source of Protein: They offer a source of plant-based protein, suitable for vegetarians and vegans. Incorporate King Oyster Mushrooms into your meals to enjoy these benefits and add a flavorful and nutritious element to your cooking.

Nutrient-Rich: Packed with essential vitamins, minerals, and healthy fats, they support overall well-being. Heart Health: Almonds are known to support cardiovascular health, thanks to their monounsaturated fats. Weight Management: Fiber and healthy fats promote a feeling of fullness, aiding in weight management. Gluten-Free: Safe for individuals with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease. Delicious and Versatile: Enjoy the natural, nutty taste of almonds in various dishes or as a convenient snack. Incorporate these premium California almonds into your diet to enjoy these benefits and enhance your overall health and nutrition.

name: Oyster Mushrooms
shortDescription: Explore the delicate and delicious taste of our Oyster Mushrooms in a convenient 200g pack. These mushrooms are known for their unique shape and rich umami flavor. Use them to elevate your culinary creations, from stir-fries to soups, and savor the natural goodness of oyster mushrooms in your dishes.
fullDescription: Oyster Mushrooms – 200g offer several health benefits => Low in Calories: They are a low-calorie option, making them suitable for weight-conscious individuals. name: Gucci Morel Mushroom – Dehydrated
shortDescription: Elevate your culinary creations with Gucci Morel Mushrooms – a 50g pack of dehydrated, high-protein, and high-fiber mushrooms. These mushrooms are not only gluten-free but also perfect for cooking and baking. Infuse your dishes with the rich and earthy flavors of Morel Mushrooms, enhancing your culinary delights with this premium ingredient.
fullDescription: Gucci Morel Mushroom – Dehydrated, 50g, offers several health benefits => High in Protein: Morel mushrooms are a good source of plant-based protein, essential for muscle repair and overall health. Dietary Fiber: Rich in dietary fiber, they promote healthy digestion and support a feeling of fullness, aiding in weight management. Gluten-Free: Ideal for individuals with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease, making them a versatile ingredient in various dishes. Distinct Flavor: Morel mushrooms have a unique and intense earthy flavor that enhances the taste of your recipes. Cooking Versatility: Suitable for a wide range of culinary applications, from savory dishes to soups, sauces, and baked goods. Incorporate Gucci Morel Mushrooms into your cooking to enjoy these benefits and elevate the flavor and nutrition of your favorite recipes.
